name: The Boundary Between Dream and Reality
name_original: The Boundary Between Dream and Reality
description:
The Boundary Between Dream and Reality  Touhou Project  point-and-click fangame 

Created for Touhou Fan Game Jam 8

Yukari wakes up in a lucid dream... and hates it, but she can't seem to wake up. Better leave the dream before things get too weird.

Game features:

  • Minimalistic gameplay
  • Missing SFX
  • Missing music in most screens
  • And much more!

Left-click to interact, right-click to cancel interactions and advance the dialog

DO NOT CLICK ON CHEN (NPC) WHEN YOU ARE ON THE PICNIC HILL, IT CAUSES A BUG THAT CAN LEAD TO THE GAME CRASHING!!

The unfinished entry originally submitted to the Jam was replaced by mistake
It was reuploaded, don't mind the time discrepancy please orz

Credits:

Story:  barukowo, Capellan, GiantCaveMushroom

Sprite Artwork: GiantCaveMushroom

Programming: barukowo

Music Arrangement: barukowo, Purulixir

All elements of Touhou Project, including characters, music, setting, and concept, are property of ZUN and Team Shanghai Alice. This game is a fanwork, and is not affiliated with or endorsed by the original creators.
